message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid I can't quite meet you at $90. I'm willing to come down to $110, but that's as low as I can go. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $110 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $100. Can you consider that?
I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I think $100 is still a bit low for the product's value. I can do $105, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I really like the product. I'm willing to meet you at $95. Can you consider that?
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob! I can see you're trying to get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $98, but I think that's as close as I can get to $95 without losing money on the deal.
I'm not sure I can go any higher than $95, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $97. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $99, but I think that's the absolute lowest I can go. I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal!
I'm really close to walking away, but I still want to try to get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $96. If you can do that, I'll buy the product from you.
